apiClassifier.shortdesc: A dialog for sharing content on Facebook.

apiParam.apiDesc: The mode with which to display the dialog.

apiValue.shortdesc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver can initiate a share.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver can initiate a share.
May return false if the appropriate Facebook app is not installed and is required or an access token is required but not available. This method does not validate the content on the receiver, so this can be checked before building up the content.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates an access token was obtained by the user logging in through the Web-based dialog on a Chrome Custom Tab.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates an access token was obtained by the user logging in through the Web-based dialog on a Chrome Custom Tab.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates an access token constructed with a Client Token.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates an access token constructed from facebook.com/device

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates an access token constructed from facebook.com/device

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates an access token was obtained by the user logging in through the Facebook app for Android using the native login dialog.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates an access token was obtained by the user logging in through the Facebook app for Android using the native login dialog.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates an access token was obtained by asking the Facebook app for the current token based on permissions the user has already granted to the app.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates an access token was obtained by asking the Facebook app for the current token based on permissions the user has already granted to the app. No dialog was shown to the user in this case.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates an access token was obtained by the user logging in through the Facebook app for Android using the web login dialog.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates an access token was obtained by the user logging in through the Facebook app for Android using the web login dialog.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates an access token has not been obtained, or is otherwise invalid.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates an access token has not been obtained, or is otherwise invalid.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates an access token is for a test user rather than an actual Facebook user.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates an access token is for a test user rather than an actual Facebook user.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates an access token was obtained by the user logging in through the Web-based dialog.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates an access token was obtained by the user logging in through the Web-based dialog.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to the person's primary email address.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to the person's primary email address.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides the access to manage call to actions of the Pages that you manage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides the access to manage call to actions of the Pages that you manage.

apiValue.shortdesc: Lets your app manage Instant Articles on behalf of Facebook Pages administered by people using your app.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Lets your app manage Instant Articles on behalf of Facebook Pages administered by people using your app.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides the access to show the list of the Pages that you manage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides the access to show the list of the Pages that you manage.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to a subset of items that are part of a person's public profile.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to a subset of items that are part of a person's public profile.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides read-only access to the Audience Network Insights data for Apps the person owns.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides read-only access to the Audience Network Insights data for Apps the person owns.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to the names of custom lists a person has created to organize their friends.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to the names of custom lists a person has created to organize their friends.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides read-only access to the Insights data for Pages, Apps and web domains the person owns.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides read-only access to the Insights data for Pages, Apps and web domains the person owns.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides the ability to read from the Page Inboxes of the Pages managed by a person.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides the ability to read from the Page Inboxes of the Pages managed by a person.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to a person's personal description (the 'About Me' section on their Profile)

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to a person's personal description (the 'About Me' section on their Profile)

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to all common books actions published by any app the person has used.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to all common books actions published by any app the person has used. This includes books they've read, want to read, rated or quoted.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to all common Open Graph fitness actions published by any app the person has used.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to all common Open Graph fitness actions published by any app the person has used. This includes runs, walks and bikes actions.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to all common Open Graph music actions published by any app the person has used.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to all common Open Graph music actions published by any app the person has used. This includes songs they've listened to, and playlists they've created.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to all common Open Graph news actions published by any app the person has used which publishes these actions.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to all common Open Graph news actions published by any app the person has used which publishes these actions. This includes news articles they've read or news articles they've published.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to all common Open Graph video actions published by any app the person has used which publishes these actions.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to all common Open Graph video actions published by any app the person has used which publishes these actions.

apiValue.shortdesc: Access the date and month of a person's birthday.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Access the date and month of a person's birthday. This may or may not include the person's year of birth, dependent upon their privacy settings and the access token being used to query this field.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to a person's education history through the education field on the User object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to a person's education history through the education field on the User object.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides read-only access to the Events a person is hosting or has RSVP'd to.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides read-only access to the Events a person is hosting or has RSVP'd to.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access the list of friends that also use your app.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access the list of friends that also use your app.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to read a person's game activity (scores, achievements) in any game the person has played.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to read a person's game activity (scores, achievements) in any game the person has played.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to a person's gender.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to a person's gender.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to a person's hometown location through the hometown field on the User object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to a person's hometown location through the hometown field on the User object.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to the list of all Facebook Pages and Open Graph objects that a person has liked.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to the list of all Facebook Pages and Open Graph objects that a person has liked.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to a person's current city through the location field on the User object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to a person's current city through the location field on the User object.

apiValue.shortdesc: Lets your app read the content of groups a person is an admin of through the Groups edge on the User object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Lets your app read the content of groups a person is an admin of through the Groups edge on the User object.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to the photos a person has uploaded or been tagged in.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to the photos a person has uploaded or been tagged in.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to the posts on a person's Timeline.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to the posts on a person's Timeline. Includes their own posts, posts they are tagged in, and posts other people make on their Timeline.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to a person's relationship interests as the interested_in field on the User object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to a person's relationship interests as the interested_in field on the User object.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to a person's relationship status, significant other and family members as fields on the User object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to a person's relationship status, significant other and family members as fields on the User object.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to a person's religious and political affiliations.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to a person's religious and political affiliations.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to the Places a person has been tagged at in photos, videos, statuses and links.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to the Places a person has been tagged at in photos, videos, statuses and links.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to the videos a person has uploaded or been tagged in.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to the videos a person has uploaded or been tagged in.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to the person's personal website URL via the website field on the User object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to the person's personal website URL via the website field on the User object.

apiValue.shortdesc: Provides access to a person's work history and list of employers via the work field on the User object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Provides access to a person's work history and list of employers via the work field on the User object.

apiValue.shortdesc: Specifies that only the web dialog auth (from anywhere) should be used

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Specifies that only the web dialog auth (from anywhere) should be used

apiValue.shortdesc: Specifies that login should only attempt to use Katana Proxy Login.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Specifies that login should only attempt to use Katana Proxy Login.

apiValue.shortdesc: Specifies that login should only attempt to login using the Facebook App.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Specifies that login should only attempt to login using the Facebook App. If the Facebook App cannot be used then the login fails.

apiValue.shortdesc: Specifies that login should attempt login in using the Facebook App, and if that does not work fall back to web dialog auth.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Specifies that login should attempt login in using the Facebook App, and if that does not work fall back to web dialog auth. This is the default behavior.

apiValue.shortdesc: Specifies that only the web dialog auth should be used.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Specifies that only the web dialog auth should be used.

apiValue.shortdesc: Specifies that only the web view dialog auth should be used.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Specifies that only the web view dialog auth should be used.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A dialog for sharing content through Messenger.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A dialog for sharing content through Messenger.

apiValue.shortdesc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver can initiate a share.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver can initiate a share.
May return false if the appropriate Facebook app is not installed and is required or an access token is required but not available. This method does not validate the content on the receiver, so this can be checked before building up the content.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that access tokens should be logged as part of the request logging; normally they are not.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that access tokens should be logged as part of the request logging; normally they are not.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates the App Events-related operations should be logged.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates the App Events-related operations should be logged.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that cache operations should be logged.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that cache operations should be logged.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that likely developer errors should be logged.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that likely developer errors should be logged. (This is set by default in LoggingBehavior.)

apiValue.shortdesc: Log warnings from API response, e.g.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Log warnings from API response, e.g. when requested feature will be deprecated in next version of API. Info is the lowest level of severity, using it will result in logging all GRAPH_API_DEBUG levels.

apiValue.shortdesc: Log debug warnings from API response, e.g.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Log debug warnings from API response, e.g. when friends fields requested, but user_friends permission isn't granted.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that the entire raw HTTP response for each request should be logged.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that the entire raw HTTP response for each request should be logged. Android Only.

apiValue.shortdesc: Log Informational occurrences.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Log Informational occurrences. iOS only.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that HTTP requests and a summary of responses should be logged.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that HTTP requests and a summary of responses should be logged.

apiValue.shortdesc: Log performance characteristics.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Log performance characteristics. iOS only.

apiValue.shortdesc: Log errors from SDK UI controls.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Log errors from SDK UI controls. iOS only.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A utility class for sharing through the graph API.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A utility class for sharing through the graph API. Using this class requires an access token that has been granted the "publish_actions" permission.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Begins the send from the receiver.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Begins the send from the receiver.

apiValue.shortdesc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver can send the share

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver can send the share
